articles.title: We finally know why NASA's Voyager 1 spacecraft stopped communicating — scientists are working on a fix - Space.com

articles.title: CERN pays tribute to Peter Higgs - CERN
articles.description: Peter Higgs has passed away at the age of 94. An iconic figure in modern science, Higgs in 1964 postulated the existence of the eponymous Higgs boson. Its discovery at CERN in 2012 was the crowning achievement of the Standard Model (SM) of particle physics – …
